[[File:Massoud 2000.jpg|thumb|left|250px|In spring 2001 the anti-Taliban leader [[Ahmad Shah Massoud]] stated that the Taliban and [[Al Qaeda]] had introduced "a very wrong perception of [[Islam]]" and warned about a large-scale attack on U.S. soil being imminent.]]

On his visit to Europe in March 2001 [[Ahmad Shah Massoud]] had warned that his intelligence had gathered information about a large-scale attack on U.S. soil being imminent.
On his visit to Europe in March 2001 [[Ahmad Shah Massoud]] had warned that his intelligence had gathered information about a large-scale attack on U.S. soil being imminent.
